item.title: Kinexys Ignites TradFi-DeFi Shift with Landmark Tokenized Treasury on Ondo Chain
item.description:
Kinexys has settled a tokenized Treasury trade on Ondo Chain using Chainlink’s CRE, connecting JPMorgan’s private blockchain to a new public Layer 1. The Delivery-versus-Payment test has shown how cross-chain workflows can cut settlement risk and improve transparency for institutional investors.

item.title: Telegram Torches Chinese Crypto Laundering Hubs in $8.4B USDT Crackdown
item.description:
Telegram has removed thousands of Xinbi and Huione channels after analysts traced $8.4B in laundered USDT through these marketplaces. The move shows how encrypted messaging and stablecoins have fueled industrial-scale fraud and human-trafficking rings across Southeast Asia.

item.title: Stablecoin Bill Gains Steam on Capitol Hill amid Trump-Linked Crypto Firestorm
item.description:
Stablecoin legislation has regained traction on Capitol Hill as Republican Bill Hagerty and Democrat Angela Alsobrooks have driven bipartisan talks on the GENIUS Act. The plan would mandate cash-backed reserves, audited data and federal oversight, with a vote targeted before Memorial Day.
